Uses of Class
imagingbook.pub.lucaskanade.LucasKanadeMatcher

  • Packages that use LucasKanadeMatcher 
    Package Description
    imagingbook.pub.lucaskanade  

    • Uses of LucasKanadeMatcher in imagingbook.pub.lucaskanade

      Subclasses of LucasKanadeMatcher in imagingbook.pub.lucaskanade 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LucasKanadeForwardMatcher
      Lucas-Kanade (forward-additive) matcher, as described in Simon Baker and Iain Matthews, "Lucas-Kanade 20 Years On: A Unifying Framework: Part 1", CMU-RI-TR-02-16 (2002) Also called the "forward-additive" algorithm.
      class  LucasKanadeInverseMatcher
      Inverse Compositional Matcher, as described in Simon Baker and Iain Matthews, "Lucas-Kanade 20 Years On: A Unifying Framework: Part 1", CMU-RI-TR-02-16 (2002)
